pages.text: And if We made him an angel, We would have made him a man, We would have dressed on him (from) what they dress
And had been mocked at messengers from before you, so those who mocked from them were afflicted/surrounded with what they were with it mocking/making fun
Say: "Walk/move in the Earth/land, then look/wonder about how was the liars`/falsifiers` end/turn (result)

Say: "To whom, what (is) in the skies/space and the earth/Planet Earth?" Say: "To God, He decreed on Himself the mercy, He will gather/collect you to the Resurrection Day, no doubt/suspicion in it, those who lost themselves, so they are not believing
And for Him (is) what settled in the night and the daytime, and He (is) the hearing/listening, the knowledgeable

Say: "Is other than God, I take (as) a guardian , (the) creator (of) the skies/space and the earth/Planet Earth, and He feeds and is not fed." Say: "I was ordered/commanded that I be first (of) who surrendered/submitted, and do not be (E) from the sharers/takers of partners (with God)
Say: "That I, I fear if I disobeyed my Lord (from) a great day`s torture
Who is diverted from it (on) that day, so He had mercy upon him, and that (is) the clear/evident success/triumph
And if God touches you with harm, so (there is)no remover/uncoverer for it except He, and if He touches you with goodness , so He is on every thing capable
And He is the defeater/conqueror over His worshippers/slaves, and He is the wise/judicious, the expert/experienced
